t: Protect*pn me, God, for I take refuge in you.
I*ln said to the Lord,*s “You are my Lord; I*ln have nothing good besides you.”
As*ln for the holy people who are in the land, they*ln are the noble ones. All*ln my delight is in them.
The*ln sorrows of those who take another god for*ln themselves will multiply; I*ln will not pour out their drink offerings of blood, and*ln I will not speak their names with my lips.
Lord,*spn you are my portion and*ln my cup of blessing; you*ln hold my future.
The*ln boundary lines have fallen for me in*ln pleasant places; indeed,*ln I have a beautiful inheritance.
I*pn will bless the Lord*s who counsels me— even*ln at night when my thoughts trouble me.
I*ln always let the Lord*s guide me. Because*ln he is at my right hand, I*ln will not be shaken.
Therefore*pn my heart is glad and*ln my whole being rejoices; my*ln body also rests securely.
For*ln you will not abandon me to Sheol; you*ln will not allow your faithful one to see decay.
You*ln reveal the path of life to me; in*ln your presence is abundant joy; at*ln your right hand are eternal pleasures.
